product_name: Ultimate Direction Jurek Endure Hydration Waistpack
long_description: The Ultimate Direction Jurek Endure Hydration Waistpack features twin bottles for a balanced load, a stretch mesh pocket for lightweight clothing and a movable pocket for gel. Hex Mesh belt is totally breathable and extremely strong and lightweight; will not absorb moisture. Pockets are ultra-lightweight silnylon, silicone-impregnated nylon that's durable and waterproof. Bottle holsters are stiffened with lightweight foam for quick access; two 10-oz. bottles included. Front pocket is sweat-resistant and moveable, with foam backing. 3/4 in. waist webbing with stretch panel and adjustable buckle; adjustable race-bib clips. Jurek Endure Hydration Waistpack from Ultimate Direction has a Velvetex edge binding that's super soft and comfortable.
short_description: The Ultimate Direction Jurek Endure Hydration Waistpack features twin bottles for a balanced load, a stretch mesh pocket for lightweight clothing and a movable pocket for gel.
